fields.name: Financial_Asset_Name
fields.helpText: A descriptive name of the bank account, retirement account, or other asset account.

fields.name: Validation_Error_Message_FA
fields.fieldText: This is a required field.

fields.name: Financial_Institution
fields.helpText: The name of the institution where the account is held.

fields.name: Account_Number
fields.helpText: The account number associated with the financial institution holding the asset.

fields.name: Cash_or_Market_Value
fields.helpText: The cash or market value of the asset at closing.

fields.name: File_as_Joint_Asset
fields.helpText: You're a co-owner of the asset.

fields.name: FinancialAsset_CoOwners_HelpText
fields.fieldText: For a co-owned asset, all borrowers that share ownership of the asset.

fields.name: Financial_Liability_Name
fields.helpText: A descriptive name of the credit card, lease, or other debt liability.

fields.name: Validation_Error_Message_FinancialLiability
fields.fieldText: This is a required field.

fields.name: FinancialLiability_Creditor_Name
fields.helpText: The lender or creditor that is owed the debt.

fields.name: FinancialLiability_Account_Number
fields.helpText: The account number associated with the lender or creditor that holds the debt.

fields.name: FinancialLiability_Unpaid_Balance
fields.helpText: The unpaid balance that you owe at the time you complete this application.

fields.name: FinancialLiability_PaidInfFull
fields.fieldText: To be paid off at or before closing
fields.helpText: The unpaid balance is to be paid off on or off before closing.

fields.name: FinancialLiability_Monthly_Payment
fields.helpText: The monthly payment required to keep your account current.

fields.name: FinancialLiability_JointLiability
fields.helpText: You're jointly responsible for the liability.

fields.name: FinancialLiability_CoOwners_HelpText
fields.fieldText: For a co-owned liability, all borrowers that share responsibility for the liability.

fields.name: Other_Asset_Name
fields.helpText: A descriptive name of the asset.

fields.name: Validation_Error_Message_OA
fields.fieldText: This is a required field.

fields.name: Other_Asset_Cash_or_Market_Value
fields.helpText: The cash or market value of the asset at closing.

fields.name: Other_Asset_File_as_Joint_Asset
fields.helpText: You're a co-owner of the asset.

fields.name: OtherAsset_CoOwners_HelpText
fields.fieldText: For a co-owned asset, all borrowers that share ownership of the asset.

fields.name: Other_Liability_Name
fields.helpText: A descriptive name of the monthly expense.

fields.name: Validation_Error_Message_OtherLiability
fields.fieldText: This is a required field.

fields.name: OtherLiability_Monthly_Payment
fields.helpText: The monthly payment for the expense.

fields.name: OtherLiability_JointLiability
fields.helpText: You're jointly responsible for the monthly expense.

fields.name: OtherLiability_CoOwners_HelpText
fields.fieldText: For a co-owned expense, all borrowers that share responsibility for the expense.

fields.name: RealEstateAsset_Title
fields.fieldText: Real Estate Assets

fields.name: RealEstate_Asset_Name
fields.helpText: A descriptive name of the real estate asset.

fields.name: Validation_Error_Message_REA
fields.fieldText: This is a required field.

fields.name: Asset_Property_Value
fields.helpText: The estimated present market value of the real estate.

fields.name: Asset_DispositionType
fields.helpText: The real estate asset's planned future use.

fields.name: Asset_RealEstateMonthlyExpense
fields.helpText: The total monthly real estate expenses including insurance, maintenance, homeowners association dues, taxes, and miscellaneous costs.

fields.name: Asset_Monthly_Rental_Income
fields.helpText: The gross monthly rental income.

fields.name: Asset_Net_Monthly_Rental_Income
fields.helpText: To be filled in by lender.

fields.name: RealEstateLiability_Creditor_Name
fields.helpText: The lender or creditor that holds the mortgage.

fields.name: RealEstateLiability_Account_Number
fields.helpText: The account number associated with the lender or creditor that holds the mortgage.

fields.name: RealEstateLiability_Monthly_Mortgage_Payment
fields.helpText: The monthly payment required to keep your mortgage current.

fields.name: RealEstateLiability_Unpaid_Balance
fields.helpText: The unpaid mortgage balance that you still owe at the time you complete this application.

fields.name: RealEstateLiability_Paid_In_Full
fields.fieldText: To be paid off at or before closing
fields.helpText: The mortgage is to be paid off on or before closing.

fields.name: RealEstateLiability_Credit_Limit
fields.helpText: The credit limit of any loan or loan of credit associated with this real estate.

fields.name: RealEstate_Asset_Is_Joint_Asset
fields.fieldText: This is jointly held real estate asset
fields.helpText: You're a co-owner of the real estate.

fields.name: RealEstateAsset_CoOwners_HelpText
fields.fieldText: For co-owned real estate, all borrowers that share ownership of the real estate.

textTemplates.name: Currency_Zero_Included_Validation_Message
textTemplates.text: Enter a number greater than or equal to 0.
